cast.overview: While Po and his father are visiting a secret panda village, an evil spirit threatens all of China, forcing Po to form a ragtag army to fight back.
cast.title: Kung Fu Panda 3

cast.original_title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
cast.overview: Born under unusual circumstances, Benjamin Button springs into being as an elderly man in a New Orleans nursing home and ages in reverse. Twelve years after his birth, he meets Daisy, a child who flits in and out of his life as she grows up to be a dancer. Though he has all sorts of unusual adventures over the course of his life, it is his relationship with Daisy, and the hope that they will come together at the right time, that drives Benjamin forward.
cast.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button

details.biography: Shiloh Nouvel Jolie, born on May 27, 2006, in Swakopmund, Namibia, is the first biological child of actors Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt. Growing up as part of a high-profile family with five siblings, Shiloh was exposed early to global travel, humanitarian causes, and the arts. She made small appearances in films like The Curious Case of Benjamin Button and Kung Fu Panda 3, but has more recently gained attention for her impressive dancing skills and choreography work under the stage name “Shi Jolie.” Known for her evolving style and independent spirit, Shiloh made headlines in 2024 when she legally dropped "Pitt" from her last name shortly after turning 18. Although she maintains a private lifestyle, Shiloh continues to pursue creative endeavors in performance and dance, reflecting both her artistic upbringing and personal sense of identity.
details.name: Shiloh Jolie
